website_summaries.verdict: This 32-inch TV won't suit everyone, but this package deal that includes a soundbar is a great bargain, and it's suitable for areas with limited space.
pros: Compact model with a 32-inch screen that's perfect for small spaces, bedrooms, and guest rooms
Nice picture quality, even though it's not 4K
A good value, as it also comes with a soundbar
cons: The small screen size won't appeal to all viewers, but it's an excellent choice for those who don't need a large TV

customer_reviews.title: Picture and sound are excellent.
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this as a secondary TV. Paid a little more for it, but it was well worth it. Set up was super easy. The picture and sound quality are excellent. Sony has been my "Go to Brand" for all my electronics for over 20 years. Have yet to be disappointed, highly recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Carole M.

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: I ti an excellent TV, with many options. I am glad I got it.
customer_reviews.author: R. M. Peddle

customer_reviews.title: Impressive
customer_reviews.text: I'm really impressed with the picture quality on this tv. It's a 32" screen, but seems bigger for some reason. With all the stuff I buy, this is one of the better purchases I've made over the last year or so. Sound bar is great, also.
customer_reviews.author: Mark A. Gleason

customer_reviews.title: Great TV!
customer_reviews.text: Beautiful picture and excellent sound quality! I bought this smaller size TV to fit into a cabinet and it's great! And the sound bar was a nice bonus.
customer_reviews.author: GAIL L. ELLETT

customer_reviews.title: Fuzzy sound
customer_reviews.text: The TV's sound is fuzzy, so it must be used with external speakers. The soundbar that it came with was pretty good, but stopped working after 18 months
customer_reviews.author: cyrus

customer_reviews.title: awashington48@outlook.com
customer_reviews.text: Have not set it up yet, but sure it will be fine sony is a name brand.
customer_reviews.author: ALBERT WASHINGTON

customer_reviews.title: Missing Cable
customer_reviews.text: I love the new TV. The picture is sharp and clear. It came packaged with a sound bar, which didn't have the right cable to connect to the TV, so it is sitting there, unused at the moment, until the cable I ordered arrives.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Soundbar
customer_reviews.text: The television is fine but I got a 35-1/2" sound bar to fit on a 29" wide tv. Its not only stupid but since I use it on my patio, the cover that fits on the tv will not fit the sound bar. I wanted to return the sound bar but as it came in a package I can't do that.
customer_reviews.author: Greg Severson

customer_reviews.title: Go Vikings
customer_reviews.text: Beautiful picture and the sound bar make watching football awesome
customer_reviews.author: Kathymae

customer_reviews.title: A great addition to a small office.
customer_reviews.text: I purchased his television for my office. Wonderful picture and sound quality.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great Combo
customer_reviews.text: Beautiful picture and awesome sound from this matched pair. Easy learning curve for my elderly mom to use as well.
customer_reviews.author: Michael White

customer_reviews.title: Overall satisfied
customer_reviews.text: Very satisfied with the TV. The sound bar doesn't have the full sound I was looking for but it will serve the purpose.
customer_reviews.author: Zinda

customer_reviews.title: Great TV & soundbar setup
customer_reviews.text: Bought for my son's dorm room at college. Very easy to setup both TV & soundbar. He seems very happy with the quality of the picture and the sound from the soundbar.
customer_reviews.author: Sandy DeLost

customer_reviews.title: 32” TVs are hard to find. I wanted a Sony.  Older model years were only other options
customer_reviews.text: I had someone else install for me but after a few tweaks, I’m happy 😃.
customer_reviews.author: Karen Lachenman

customer_reviews.title: Sony is Best
customer_reviews.text: I always bought Sony and everyone convinced me to go cheaper. The TVS broke in a year. Sony has always lasted I will never buy another company. Buying 9-1
customer_reviews.author: Cynthia Leona

product_meta.title: Sony KDL32W600D 32-Inch HD Smart TV w/Soundbar Bundles (S100F Bundle)
product_meta.description:
Experience detail like never before with the Sony W600D 32-Inch Built-In Wi-Fi HD TV. Sony synthesized the knowledge gained from years of developing movies and TV to create a unique database that re-patterns and sharpens each pixel, while the Full HD experience upscales and redefines images for unparalleled realism. Slim and streamline, the design channels a modern Sony structural ethos that lets you focus on the picture – not the television. With access to Apps like Youtube and Netflix as well as play back through USB, it’s easy to enjoy your favorite media any way you like.

Slim and Streamlined Design

A window into another world, this streamline television blends perfectly into your living room. True to the modern Sony design ethos that favors balanced, beautiful slates, this clean frame channels harmony and comfort in a thin bezel.

Full High Definition 

Experience stunning Full HD picture quality, whatever you’re watching. Sony’s unique X-Reality PRO processing engine analyzes, cleans and refines images for beautifully detailed viewing. Even content streamed in low resolution is enhanced with X-Reality PRO to give a picture by Sony that brings everything you watch to life.

Reality Pro

With X-Reality PRO, patterns in images are compared with patterns stored in a unique database to sharpen each pixel. We use the knowledge gained from developing and filing blockbuster movies and TV shows to deliver supremely lifelike detail in everything you watch.

Bundle Includes:

 * Sony W600D 32-Inch Built-In Wi-Fi HD TV
 * Sony HT-S100F 2.0 Channel Soundbar with Integrated Tweeter
feature_bullets: STREAMLINE DESIGN: Blends perfectly into your living room letting you focus on the picture – not the television
FULL HD: X-Reality PRO processing engine analyzes, cleans and refines images for beautifully detailed viewing
BUILT-IN WIFI: Go online and browse movies, enjoy video channels like YouTube and access services such as on-demand TV
BUNDLE INCLUDES: Sony W600D 32-Inch Built-In Wi-Fi HD TV / Sony HT-S100F 2.0 Channel Soundbar with Integrated Tweeter
SONY Authorized Dealer – Includes USA Manufacturer’s Warranty
